cu.explanation_en: Setting the ciphering algorithm to the unknown enum 'nea5' will cause negotiation failure during the security negotiation phase and connection establishment rejection.

du.explanation_en: Setting global_log_level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration failure as the system expects valid log levels like 'info', 'debug', etc.
du.explanation_zh: 將 global_log_level 設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid' 會導致日誌配置失敗，因為系統期望有效的日誌級別如 'info'、'debug' 等。
